step: Set the washing machine to a hot, long wash. Push the hot wash button and then select the long wash option.
Add 1 quart (946 mL) of bleach into the machine.
Pause the cycle to allow the bleach to soak in for 1 hour.
Restart the machine to allow the cycle to finish.
task: How to Use Bleach in Your Washing Machine
steps:
```pddl
1. (fill(actor laundry chlorine dispenser))
2. (fill(actor laundry detergent dispenser))
3. (bring(p laundry loc washingmachine))
4. (run(p washingmachine laundry chlorine))
5. (rinse(agent laundry water))
```

similar_task.task: How to Use Bleach when Doing Your Laundry
step: Fill a bucket or sink with 1 gallon (3.8 L) of hot water.
Mix 1 tablespoon (15 mL) of oxygen or chlorine bleach into the water.
Add your usual washing detergent to treat stained items.
Soak your laundry for up to 1 hour.
Rinse the items under cold water.

concept_knowledge: You are likely to find [[a fish]] in [[water]].

step: Set your washer to the highest heat possible.
Add detergent and bleach if your machine has a bleach dispenser.
Add water first if your machine doesn’t have a bleach dispenser.
Add bleach 5 minutes into the cycle.
Add the clothing to the washer.
Allow the washer to run normally.
Finished.

similar_task.task: How to Lighten Clothing with Bleach
step: Read the tag to determine if the fabric is safe to bleach.
Spread the garment on an old towel in a well-ventilated space.
Fill a spray bottle with bleach and water.
Spritz the garment until it's as lightened as you like.
Machine wash the clothes according to the care label.

concept_knowledge: You are likely to find [[water]] in [[a bottle]]

step: Don't use chlorinated bleach on hemp.
Avoid high-heat.
Don't dry clean hemp.
steps:
```pddl
(:action fill
    :parameters (?actor ?item ?resource ?location)
    :precondition (and (actor ?actor) (item ?item) (resource ?resource) (location ?location))
    :effect (and (filled ?item ?resource ?location))
)

(:action bring
    :parameters (?p ?item ?loc ?target_loc)
    :precondition (and (person ?p) (item ?item) (location ?loc) (location ?target_loc))
    :effect (and (at ?item ?target_loc))
)

(:action rinse
    :parameters (?agent ?item ?water)
    :precondition (and (agent ?agent) (item ?item) (water ?water))
    :effect (and (washed ?item ?water))
)

(:init
    (actor npc)
    (item hemp)
    (resource water)
    (location bathroom)
    (location kitchen)
)

(:goal
    (washed hemp water)
)

(:steps
    (fill npc bucket water kitchen)
    (bring npc bucket kitchen bathroom)
    (rinse npc hemp water)
)
```

step: Wear rubber gloves when working with bleach.
Work in a well-ventilated room.
Pour the bleach over a sink or tub.
Use cold water.
Avoid using undiluted bleach.
